name: io.github.sidart10/runway-mcp-server
title: Runway AI Video Generation
description: Comprehensive MCP server for Runway ML featuring Gen-4 image generation, Veo 3 video models, Aleph video editing (add/remove objects, change camera angles, transform lighting), video extension, 4K upscaling, and style transfer. Supports text-to-video, image-to-video, and advanced video-to-video editing workflows.
